pages.text: ATFC implements three food items that will never rot, allowing for better industrialisation of food production.$(br2)These foods will always stack, unlike others which are limited by different expiration dates. They can also be mass-produced and stored without worrying about waste.

The most basic of the three is the $(thing)Sweet Roll$(). While all three require machinery in order to be automated, Sweet Rolls can be crafted using only Copper Age machines.$(br2)However, they only provide two nutritional groups ($(thing)Grain$() and $(thing)Dairy$()) rather than three.

$(thing)Pumpkin Pie$() is harder to craft, requiring Iron Age technology to automate, along with semi-valuable resources like $(thing)Sugar$() and $(thing)Eggs$().$(br2)Pumpkin Pie provides $(thing)Grain$(), $(thing)Vegetables$() and $(thing)Fruit$() as nutrition.

$(thing)Bone Broth$() is made in a heated Mixer and requires both $(thing)Milk$() and $(thing)Water$() to craft, along with any 2 vegetables and $(thing)Bones$().$(br2)Bone Broth provides $(thing)Vegetables$(), $(thing)Protein$() and $(thing)Dairy$() as nutrition.
